questions.question: How do I create an account as a worker?
questions.answer: Click 'Sign Up,' choose 'Worker,' and fill in your details including your profession. Upload any required certifications and verify your email or phone number.

questions.question: How do I sign up as a customer?
questions.answer: Click 'Sign Up,' select 'Customer,' enter your personal details, verify your email or phone number, and start booking services.

questions.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
questions.answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and follow the instructions to reset your password.

questions.question: How do I update my email address?
questions.answer: Go to 'Account Settings' and click on 'Edit Email,' then enter your new email and verify it through the confirmation link sent to your new address.

questions.question: Can I change my phone number?
questions.answer: Yes, go to 'Account Settings' > 'Edit Phone Number' and follow the verification process for the new number.

questions.question: What do I do if I don’t receive the verification link?
questions.answer: Check your spam folder or resend the link from 'Account Settings.' If the issue persists, contact customer support.

questions.question: How do I delete my account?
questions.answer: To delete your account, go to 'Account Settings,' scroll down to 'Delete Account,' and follow the instructions. Note that this action is irreversible.

questions.question: Can I switch between customer and worker accounts?
questions.answer: No, you need to create separate accounts if you want to be both a worker and a customer.

questions.question: How do I deactivate my account temporarily?
questions.answer: Go to 'Account Settings' and select 'Deactivate Account' to temporarily disable your account. You can reactivate it at any time by logging in.

questions.question: Why is my account suspended?
questions.answer: Your account may be suspended due to a violation of terms of service or suspicious activity. Contact support for more details.

questions.question: How do I book a service?
questions.answer: Select a service category (e.g., carpentry, electrical), pick a worker, choose a time, and confirm the booking.

questions.question: Can I book multiple services at once?
questions.answer: Yes, you can add multiple services to your booking and schedule them as needed.

questions.question: How do I reschedule a booking?
questions.answer: Go to 'My Bookings,' select the job you want to reschedule, and choose a new date and time.

questions.question: How can I cancel a booking?
questions.answer: You can cancel a booking from 'My Bookings' by selecting the job and clicking 'Cancel.' Cancellation fees may apply.

questions.question: How do I view my upcoming bookings?
questions.answer: Go to 'My Bookings' in your profile to see a list of all scheduled tasks.

questions.question: What happens if the worker doesn’t show up?
questions.answer: If a worker fails to show up, you can request a refund or reschedule the service by contacting support.

questions.question: Can I request a specific worker?
questions.answer: Yes, you can choose a specific worker by browsing their profile and selecting them when booking.

questions.question: How do I contact the worker before the job?
questions.answer: Once the booking is confirmed, you can contact the worker through the in-app messaging system.

questions.question: Can I modify the service after booking?
questions.answer: Yes, you can modify the scope of work or add services by editing the booking details under 'My Bookings.'

questions.question: What if the worker requests extra charges?
questions.answer: Workers can only request extra charges if additional tasks are added. You will be notified of any extra charges before payment.

questions.question: What payment methods are accepted?
questions.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, mobile wallets, and cash on delivery (where applicable).

questions.question: How do I add a payment method?
questions.answer: Go to 'Payment Methods' in 'Account Settings' and add your preferred card or wallet details.

questions.question: Is my payment information secure?
questions.answer: Yes, your payment information is encrypted and stored securely using industry-standard protocols.

questions.question: How do I request a refund?
questions.answer: You can request a refund by going to 'Support' and submitting a refund request for the relevant booking.

questions.question: Can I pay in cash?
questions.answer: Yes, cash on delivery is available for certain services and regions.

questions.question: How long does it take to process a refund?
questions.answer: Refunds are processed within 3-5 business days after approval.

questions.question: What should I do if my payment fails?
questions.answer: Ensure that your payment details are correct and that you have sufficient funds. You can also try a different payment method.

questions.question: How can I view my payment history?
questions.answer: Go to 'Payment History' in your account to view all past payments and transactions.

questions.question: Can I split payments between two methods?
questions.answer: Currently, payments cannot be split between multiple methods.

questions.question: Why was my payment declined?
questions.answer: Payments can be declined due to insufficient funds, incorrect card details, or restrictions from your bank. Contact your bank for further information.

questions.question: How do I update my worker profile?
questions.answer: Go to 'Profile' and click 'Edit' to update your personal and professional details.

questions.question: How do I add a new service to my profile?
questions.answer: Go to 'My Services' under your profile and click 'Add Service,' then select the service type and set your rate.

questions.question: How do I set my availability?
questions.answer: Go to 'Availability' in your profile settings and set the days and times you are available to work.

questions.question: How do I manage my service rates?
questions.answer: You can update your service rates by going to 'My Services' and editing the pricing for each service.

questions.question: How do I track my earnings?
questions.answer: Go to 'Earnings' in your dashboard to see a breakdown of your earnings for the week or month.

questions.question: When will I receive my payment?
questions.answer: Payments are processed 2-3 business days after the job is marked as completed.

questions.question: How do I withdraw my earnings?
questions.answer: You can withdraw your earnings to your linked bank account or mobile wallet by going to 'Withdraw Earnings' in your dashboard.

questions.question: Can I receive tips from customers?
questions.answer: Yes, customers can tip you after the job is completed. Tips are included in your earnings.

questions.question: How do I view customer ratings?
questions.answer: You can view customer ratings and reviews by going to your profile and clicking on 'Reviews.'

questions.question: Why was my account rating lowered?
questions.answer: Account ratings can be impacted by customer feedback. Ensure timely service and quality work to maintain a high rating.
